modName: Mod Organizer - Black and Bright Green Icons
summary: A black icon I found in the Mod Organizer files. I resized it and converted it so it fit in with the other icons from crygieUK's "Mod Organizer Custom Icons".
descriptionHtml:
This is just a simple conversion  of the not-used black icon found in the Mod Organizer files.

I resized it and converted it so it fit in with the other icons from crygieUK's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58463]Mod Organizer Custom Icons[/url].

I use it for Oblivion, but you can of course use it for whatever you want! :]

This download just includes the .ico image file - to use it, you need to make a shortcut of "ModOrganizer.exe", then right click -> Properties -> Change Icon...

----------------------
Once Mod Organizer 2 is fully functional, this may become obsolete, as it is going to include the ability to have just one executable for all your games, but for now I figured, hey, why not just release this quickly in case anyone else wants to use it! :]

----------------------
Changelog:

v1.0:
- Initial Release

v2.0:
- Added a bright green icon variant that I made (by request) for use with games like Fallout 4.
author: Ulithium_Dragon
